attributes.title: Week Zero
attributes.caption: Josh, Meg, and Zach assess their fitness goals and prepare to embark on an intense 16-week workout in order to lose weight, win races, and… recreate famous music videos?
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! Josh, Meg, and Zach assess their fitness goals and prepare to embark on an intense 16-week workout in order to lose weight, win races, and recreate famous music videos

attributes.title: Week One
attributes.caption: ​Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! Josh, Meg, and Zach crash into a variety of hurdles during their first week, including tempting donuts, ornery canines, and... brain trauma. Seriously.​
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! Josh, Meg, and Zach crash into a variety of hurdles during their first week, including tempting donuts, ornery canines, and... brain trauma. Seriously.

attributes.title: Week Two
attributes.caption: As the Josh, Meg, and Zach battle diet temptations, one buff buddy may be trying to sabotage the others…
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! As the Josh, Meg, and Zach battle diet temptations, one buff buddy may be trying to sabotage the others

attributes.title: Weeks Three & Four
attributes.caption: Travel, holidays, and ill-fitting clothes conspire to ruin the Buff Buddies fitness battles.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! Travel, holidays, and ill-fitting clothes conspire to ruin the Buff Buddies fitness battles.

attributes.title: Week Five
attributes.caption: As Thanksgiving brings everyone together, the first race of the season threatens to tear them apart.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! As Thanksgiving brings everyone together, the first race of the season threatens to tear them apart.

attributes.title: Weeks Six & Seven
attributes.caption: The Buff Buddies do one of those special episodes where they talk about their genuine workout trials and tribulations. Or whatever.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! The Buff Buddies do one of those special episodes where they talk about their genuine workout trials and tribulations. Or whatever.

attributes.title: Week Eight
attributes.caption: Twas the week before Christmas… which also happened to be the halfway point of the buff buddies’ fitness journey! But while holiday treats derail some, others may be forced to rethink their goals entirely.​
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! Twas the week before Christmas which also happened to be the halfway point of the buff buddies fitness journey! But while holiday treats derail some, others may be forced to rethink their goals entirely.

attributes.title: Week Nine
attributes.caption: The guys indulge over Christmas break and don’t care what you think, and Zach finds an unconventional way to lose some extra weight.​
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! The guys indulge over Christmas break and don't care what you think, and Zach finds an unconventional way to lose some extra weight.

attributes.title: Weeks Ten & Eleven
attributes.caption: The buddies ring in the New Year with a bang. Also, Vegas buffets.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! The buddies ring in the New Year with a bang. Also, Vegas buffets.

attributes.title: Weeks Twelve & Thirteen
attributes.caption: This week, mirrors turn on the Buff Buddies in more ways than one.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! This week, mirrors turn on the Buff Buddies in more ways than one.

attributes.title: Week Fourteen
attributes.caption: With two weeks to go, the Buff Buddies travel the globe and fend off perilous butt selfie challenges.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! With two weeks to go, the Buff Buddies travel the globe and fend off perilous butt selfie challenges.

attributes.title: Week Fifteen
attributes.caption: It’s the penultimate episode of Buff Buddies, which means a… butt selfie-off… apparently. Also, some reflecting. ​
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! It’s the penultimate episode of Buff Buddies, which means a… butt selfie-off… apparently. Also, some reflecting.

attributes.title: Buff Buddies Finale
attributes.caption: The Buff Buddies race to the end of the season with... some races. And that moment you really came to watch: the D'Angelo-debut of Zach Anner.
attributes.description: Thanks to Onnit for sponsoring this series! The Buff Buddies race to the end of the season with... some races. And that moment you really came to watch: the D'Angelo-debut of Zach Anner.
